nodes.bodyText: rename to chunk load colony, easier understandable
I wanted to avoid calling it that because people will confuse it with "my colony is always chunkloaded with it even I'm not in range or offline"
I'd call this updateChunkLoadTimer() and mention that its updating the timer or unloading the chunks when the time runs out
move this to worldTickSlow instead, here its only updated when the colony is not loaded
It's in both. We need it in both, else it won't unload it when the player is not around. (offline or far away)
